title: Two Weddings and a Baby
description: Tamsyn Thorne has not been back to her home town of Poldore for five long years.But now her brother, Ruan, is about to get married and she has no excuses left.Her plans to arrive in Cornwall looking chic and successful are dashed when a huge storm turns her from fashion goddess to a drowned rat. Worse, she ends up insulting the local hunky vicar – and then finds a tiny baby abandoned in his churchyard…
author: Scarlett Bailey
